data.text: Wehile wangubilimaga hanga hambe wawinjigwe na munhu,
Mhela isi hoiwa kuli kubelenhuka, yanguwa na vilongozi wenji,
Mzunwa yalinguwabunza wazunwa ng'hatu,
Wanhu walingubena malajizo wanguwatogolaga wehile,
Wehile hawavizelele mana ya hachi,
Fola mzunwa yalingikala kwa kugoloka,
Mwana yalingibatilila malajizo ndo yawele na luhala,
Yalingonjeza lufufu lwa heye kwa kugana liba ng'hulu,
Yalingulema kugahulichiza malajizo,
Yalingumhada munhu yanojile kudita gehile,
Yawele na lufufu kangiwonaga kota ka yawele na luhala,
Wone wanhu wanojile wapate ulongozi, wanhu wangusangalala,
Yalinguvisa nongwa za heye, mbuli za heye haziweza kuluta goya,
Kotambichizwa munhu yalingumdumba Mkulu Nguluwi mazuwa gose,
Chilongozi mwihe yalinguwalongoza wazunwa,
Chilongozi yalihela nyhala ndo yehile na kahela isungu,
Munhu yalingutunyigwa na nongwa ya kukopola munhu,
Yalingikala kwa kutanganika koloholigwa na mbuli zihile,
Yalingulima mgunda wa heye kowa na chilyo chinji,
Munhu yalingukundigwa kowa na utambichizo winji,
Hainojile kulajila uganililo,
Mbuhu kangubilimilaga lufufu,
Yalingumkanya myage hamba kanguwaga na ganojile ng'hatu,
Yalinguhiza lufufu lwa mhaza wa heye ama mayake, yolonga kota haiwele nongwa,
Mbuhu kangwambuzaga kilewa,
Yalingitumbila nyhala za heye yuye ka mpoka,
Yawele na isungu kwa wazunwa, hopunguchilwa chinhu choneche,
Wone wehile walongoze, wanhu wangivisaga,
